Reviews.Title: Excellence Service
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: First, I bought the iPhone 4s 32GB.  When I received the product, I started use it.  Then the phone was turn off by it self after about 20 min., and it will not turn on.  I contacted the seller and he agreed to send me a new phone for a replacement.  I received the phone within a week.  The new phone work great and I got an upgrade from 32GB to 64GB.  The seller provided an excellence service and fast shipment.  I would recommend a friend to buy product from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price. Dishonest Description.
Reviews.Author: Andy Colón
Reviews.Content: The item description said Like New, but I received a cellphone with multiple scratcheson the back and on the screen. It seems like this iphone never wore a case. There's alsoa delay when you adjust settings. I didn't return it because I was about to travel abroad.Even though it is a 32gb, I paid too much for what I got.

Reviews.Title: Good phone but beware of ios6.
Reviews.Author: Alacrity
Reviews.Content: I got this phone to replace a 3gs. Mainly for a better camera. the phone is faster and the pictures are a big improvement. Now the problem. The phone is running ios6. Since I am on h20 wireless the MMS picture messaging will not work! I have tried everything to make it work and apple is no help.MMS will work on ios5. If I had known of this problem I would have gotten a phone without ios6.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Diana Bozarth "Diana Bozarth"
Reviews.Content: Works fine easy to get hooked up with a month to month service provider. Verizon wouldn't hook me up unless it was their phone so, their loss.

Reviews.Title: just great
Reviews.Author: jdog
Reviews.Content: i use it for many things (calendar, messaging, photo/video, and other various apps) and it is perfect for me.  no complaints!
